did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes papers documenting Sid Saltzman's work.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Emeritus professor in City and Regional Planning, Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, publications, research material on regional modeling, regional science, economic development and public policy analysis in the United States and abroad, and course material on quantitative and modeling, statistics, econometrics, input-output and social accounting matrix models, regional science and quantitative public policy analysis.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University.College of Architecture, Art, and Planning.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Sid Saltzman papers, #15-2-3808. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
